metadata.description: Force-directed graph simulation engine for Academic Explorer

options.command: pnpm exec nx watch --projects simulation --includeDependentProjects -- pnpm exec nx build-deps simulation

metadata.description: Custom Nx generators for Academic Explorer monorepo
TypeScript client for the OpenAlex API with comprehensive entity support and utilities

options.command: pnpm exec nx watch --projects client --includeDependentProjects -- pnpm exec nx build-deps client

metadata.scriptContent: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run test

metadata.description: Core graph data structures and types for Academic Explorer

options.command: pnpm exec nx watch --projects graph --includeDependentProjects -- pnpm exec nx build-deps graph

metadata.scriptContent: nx typecheck graph && pnpm lint && pnpm test:coverage && pnpm build

metadata.description: Type definitions, schemas, and type guards for Academic Explorer
Shared utilities and helpers for Academic Explorer

options.command: pnpm exec nx watch --projects utils --includeDependentProjects -- pnpm exec nx build-deps utils

metadata.description: Reusable UI components for Academic Explorer built with Mantine and XYFlow

metadata.deprecated: Use devTargetName instead. This option will be removed in Nx 22.

options.command: echo 'UI package uses Vite for type checking during build'
pnpm exec nx watch --projects ui --includeDependentProjects -- pnpm exec nx build-deps ui

metadata.description: Command-line interface for OpenAlex data access

options.command: pnpm exec nx watch --projects cli --includeDependentProjects -- pnpm exec nx build-deps cli

metadata.description: Academic Explorer Web App - React SPA for OpenAlex API exploration

metadata.deprecated: Use devTargetName instead. This option will be removed in Nx 22.

options.command: pnpm exec nx watch --projects web --includeDependentProjects -- pnpm exec nx build-deps web

echo 'Academic Explorer Generators Available:' && echo '  - library: Create new packages with proper structure' && echo '  - component: Generate React components with testing and Storybook' && echo '  - entity-view: Generate OpenAlex entity views with routing'

metadata.scriptContent: nx reset && rm -rf dist coverage .nx/cache .tanstack node_modules/.vite && pnpm --filter='*' clean
